meanings.definition: A muscle that turns the hand or foot palm upward.
meanings.sent1: The supinators in my wrist help me turn my hand to show my palm.
meanings.sent2: Athletes often strengthen their supinators to improve their performance.
meanings.sent3: The supinators in his ankle were so strong, he could easily balance a ball on his foot.
meanings.sent4: Her supinators were like little helpers, always ready to turn her hand in the right direction.
meanings.sent5: The supinators, like tiny palm lifters, worked tirelessly to keep her hand facing upward.
